ygData.subject: Re: Iron Raptor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Prowl looks at Iron Raptor with a bit of surprize as he hears her defiant thought, looking into her eyes. She didn t want him to leave, or die? Some hope

::Prowl::

Prowl looks at Iron Raptor with a bit of surprize as he hears her 
defiant thought, looking into her eyes. She didn't want him to leave, 
or die? Some hope swelled in the Maximal as he hears her words, 
happiness swelling in him as he feels the love flowing from her.

His arms slide around her as she hugs him, Prowl looking down into 
Iron Raptor's eyes. The effect her exclamation had on him was 
amazing. He felt love for her flowing through him, and knew that she 
would be able to feel it too. Combined with the emotions he felt from 
her, this was the strongest feeling he'd ever had.

"I love you too," he says, leaning forward to kiss her. There were no 
longer any thoughts of jealousy, no thought crossed his mind but one 
of how much he loved the femm in his arms.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * He hadn't responded to her kiss, and she knew that his depression 
went 
> very deep by that alone if not the fact that she could feel it too.
> But she looked back into his eyes as he leaved back and looked into 
her own.
> Her fingers stroked his cheek as he appologized, almost waiting to 
hear him 
> call her something like love or darling or anything else.
> Though, she heard Prowl wishing that maybe it would be better if 
Oblitertron 
> had killed him instead of nearly doing so, making Oron Raptor look 
at Prowl 
> with an expression that spoke for him not to think like that. Then 
thinking 
> that it would be better for HER if Prowl died in the next battle.
> 
> < No!> was her thought.
> 
> Then realizing through Prowls thoughts that they were linked in a 
way so 
> that if one of them died the other would do so too, wondering just 
what else 
> was included in this deal that Prowl had made with the Matrix.
> Iron Raptors expression changed to that of surprise as Prowl speaks.
> Her voice a little shaky, half of it being from the feelings which 
were 
> running through Prowl.
> Finally one feeling recognizable over all in her mind, love.*
> 
> " No! Don't talk like that! I don't want anyone else, I want you."
> 
> * Then hearing Prowl finish his sentance in his mind, making her 
suddenly 
> take him in her arms and hug him to her.*
> 
> " I love you!"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
